fullDescription: Grocery prices are up 30%+ since 2020, and food shortages are becoming more common. The Family Survival Garden teaches you how to create a self-sustaining food garden that produces fresh vegetables, fruits, and herbs year-round â€” enough to dramatically reduce your grocery bill or even eliminate it entirely. The guide covers companion planting, soil preparation, seed saving, food preservation, and how to plan a garden that produces food in every season. Unlike generic gardening books, this guide is specifically designed around food security and self-sufficiency, making it extremely compelling for anyone worried about the state of the world. With 75% commission and a survival crossover appeal, this product converts extremely well with both homesteaders and mainstream audiences.
